Experience

Lion Sands River Lodge is the heart & soul of Lion Sands & is built on the banks of the Sabie River in the Southern section of the Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park.
This area is well known for its spectacular game viewing. In fact, guests don’t have to leave the lodge for excellent sightings – it is not uncommon to spot animals wandering by while relaxing in a lounger by the swimming pool.

Stay

Lion Sands River Lodge features 8 luxury rooms, 6 superior luxury suites, 3 river suites & 1 family river suite.
Each of the 8 luxury rooms has an en-suite bathroom, lounge & wooden deck with bush views.
The 6 superior luxury rooms are larger & have ample open-plan bathrooms & outdoor showers – 2 sets are inter-leading, making them ideal for families.
Each of the 3 river suites is located further away from the main lodge & enjoy a more private setting. The river views from these suites are fantastic & best appreciated from the expansive decks. The river suites also have romantic outdoor showers.
The family river suite has 2 bedrooms with inter-leading doors & therefore an ideal choice for families travelling with young children.
The main lodge area features a spa, bar, large deck with pool, gym, library & computer facilities.

Activities

Exciting activities are available at Lion Sands River Lodge.
Some of these include open 4x4 day & night drives, guided walking safaris, spa treatments, astronomy evenings, bush dinners & picnics & romantic sleep-outs in Kingston or Chalkley Treehouse not too far from camp.

subfolders.title: Arathusa Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Arathusa Safari Lodge lies in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park in South Africa. The lodge is built on the edge of a waterhole where plenty of animal activity takes place.  Guests at Arathusa are treated to an exceptional wildlife experience, including the prized Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino.

subfolders.title: Cheetah Plains Private Villas
subfolders.description: Designed by an international award-winning firm of architects, Cheetah Plains Private Villas certainly sets the standard for exclusive-use safari living. Set in the iconic Sabi Sand Private Game Reserve & sharing an unfenced border with the game-packed Kruger National Park, Cheetah Plains always delivers exceptional Big 5 wildlife viewing.

subfolders.title: Chitwa Chitwa
subfolders.description: Chitwa Chitwa is set on one of the largest lakes in the exclusive 63,000 hectares Sabi Sand Private Game Reserve, which forms part of the Greater Kruger National Park. The lodge is a classic combination between European style & African chic & welcomes guests to kick off their shoes & relax in a remote & tranquil African bush setting.

subfolders.title: Dulini Leadwood
subfolders.description: Situated on the banks of the Sand River in South Africa’s famous Sabi Sand Reserve, Dulini Leadwood offers excellent Big 5 game viewing & luxurious safari living. Game drives traverse an area of 10,000 hectares & strict vehicle limits at sighting ensure the exclusivity of any game experience.  Since the lodge is located within a private concession, off-road driving & night drives are permitted, ensuring a fantastic safari experience.

subfolders.title: Dulini Moya
subfolders.description: Adjacent to the world-renowned Kruger National Park, the Sabi Sand Reserve is famed for its excellent Big 5 wildlife sightings & close encounters.  It is here where Dulini Moya is located. With no boundaries between the Kruger National Park & the Sabi Sand Reserve, this area benefits from the great diversity of wildlife found in one of Africa’s richest wildlife destinations.

subfolders.title: Dulini River
subfolders.description: Dulini River boasts a spectacular setting in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Game Reserve, right on the edge of the Sand River. With a remarkable river location, it is not surprising to spot animals from the comfort of your suite or the lodge’s main viewing deck.

subfolders.title: Elephant Plains
subfolders.description: Elephant Plains is located within the heart of the Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park in South Africa. The lodge is great for families & offers excellent Big 5 game viewing as well as some of the rarer species, such as African wild dog & cheetah.

subfolders.title: Kirkman's Camp
subfolders.description: Kirkman’s Camp is located above the Sand River in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve, forming part of the Greater Kruger region. Named after one of the early conservationists, W. Harry Kirkman, the lodge is decorated in 1920’s style with French doors, rolling lawns & a tennis court.

subfolders.title: Leopard Hills
subfolders.description: Leopard Hills is set on a hill overlooking a natural waterhole within the wildlife-rich Sabi Sand Reserve & bordering South Africa’s famed Kruger National Park.  This luxurious lodge provides jaw-dropping views over the African bush. This southern section of the Sabi Sand Private Game Reserve is “Big 5 Paradise.” The lodge’s prime waterhole location is fantastic because animals often make their way here for a drink.  Guests can enjoy front-row game viewing from the comfort of the lodge’s viewing deck.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands Fish Eagle Villa
subfolders.description: Lion Sands Fish Eagle Villa is an exclusive & private piece of paradise on the banks of the Sabie River in the world-famous Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park. The villa is part of Lion Sands Ivory Lodge but operates & functions privately so that guests have an exclusive safari experience.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands Ivory Lodge
subfolders.description: Lion Sands Ivory Lodge is built on the banks of the Sabie River in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve, with views extending onto the open sandbanks of the Kruger National Park. This southern section of the Sabi Sand Reserve is well known for its sensational Big 5 game viewing as well as frequent cat sightings.

subfolders.title: Lion Sands River Lodge
subfolders.description: Lion Sands River Lodge is the heart & soul of Lion Sands & is built on the banks of the Sabie River in the Southern section of the Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park. This area is well known for its spectacular game viewing.  In fact, guests don’t have to leave the lodge for excellent sightings – it is not uncommon to spot animals wandering by while relaxing in a lounger by the swimming pool.

subfolders.title: Londolozi Founders Camp
subfolders.description: Londolozi Founders Camp is located within the heart of the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve in the Greater Kruger region. The root of the word ‘Londolozi’ is the Zulu word for protect & means ‘protector of all living things’ – therefore a strong emphasis is placed on conservation & sensitivity to nature.

subfolders.title: Londolozi Pioneer Camp
subfolders.description: Londolozi Pioneer Camp offers exclusive accommodation in the heart of the world-renowned Sabi Sand Game Reserve.  This area forms part of the Greater Kruger region & offers excellent Big 5 wildlife viewing. Londolozi Pioneer Camp provides an intimate & secluded safari experience in a game-packed environment where frequent Big 5 sightings can be enjoyed.

subfolders.title: Londolozi Private Granite Suites
subfolders.description: Londolozi’s most luxurious safari camp, Private Granite Suites is the cherry on the cake when it comes to privacy & exclusivity.   Situated in the wildlife-rich Sabi Sand Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger, Londolozi Private Granite Suites only accommodates 6 guests, ensuring personal attention & dedicated service.

subfolders.title: Londolozi Tree Camp
subfolders.description: Londolozi Tree Camp is located within the world-renowned Sabi Sand Game Reserve, a private wildlife sanctuary adjacent to the Kruger National Park. Rated by many as one of Africa’s most beautiful lodges, Londolozi Tree Camp takes the name from an ancient Ebony tree shading the main deck.

subfolders.title: Londolozi Varty Camp
subfolders.description: Londolozi Varty Camp, the first of Londolozi’s 5 luxury safari camps was built in 1926 & celebrates its history & authenticity with its own bush museum. Situated in the famous Sabi Sand Game Reserve adjacent to the Kruger National Park, Londolozi Varty Camp ensures excellent Big 5 game viewing year-round.

subfolders.title: Mala Mala Camp
subfolders.description: Mala Mala, run by the Rattray family, is South Africa’s first private game reserve that opened its doors to eco-tourism.  Located within the famous Sabi Sand Reserve, Mala Mala is not only a giant in the safari industry but consistently provides fantastic Big 5 game viewing. As South Africa’s largest private game reserve, Mala Mala features 3 luxury camps.  Mala Mala Camp, Mala Mala Sable Camp & Mala Mala Rattray’s Camp.

subfolders.description: Mala Mala, run by the Rattray family, is South Africa’s first private game reserve that opened its doors to eco-tourism. subfolders.title: Nottens Bush Camp
subfolders.description: Notten’s Bush Camp is a hidden gem set in the heart of the Sabi Sand Game Reserve & shares an unfenced border with the Kruger National Park. Notten’s is an exclusive & private safari lodge personally owned & run by the Notten family.  They treat each guest like a member of the family & offers relaxed, yet personalized service.

subfolders.title: Sabi Sabi Bush Lodge
subfolders.description: Deep in the African bushveld, in the heart of the Sabi Sand Reserve, lies one of South Africa’s most famous safari lodges.  Sabi Sabi is home to the Big 5 & offers excellent year-round game viewing. Sabi Sabi consists of 4 lodges:  Bush Lodge, Selati Lodge, Little Bush Camp & Earth Lodge – each providing its own unique style & flavour.

Sabi Sabi is home to the Big 5 & offers excellent year-round game viewing. Sabi Sabi consists of 4 lodges:  Bush Lodge, Selati Lodge, Little Bush Camp & Earth Lodge – each providing its own unique style & flavour.

Sabi Sabi consists of 4 lodges:  Bush Lodge, Selati Lodge, Little Bush Camp & Earth Lodge – each providing its own unique style & flavour.

subfolders.title: Savanna Lodge
subfolders.description: Savanna Lodge is situated in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve within the Greater Kruger National Park conservancy. Savanna lies in an area where Big 5 sightings are so frequent, it is not unusual to see lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino in a single game drive.

subfolders.title: Silvan Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Silvan Safari Lodge enjoys a prime location in the Sabi Sand Reserve & shares an unfenced border with the Kruger National Park. No level of luxury was overlooked to create the world’s grandest safari experience.  Apart from world-class wildlife viewing, the focus at Silvan is on service.  Guests will receive personal butlers for the duration of their stay, ensuring their needs are met & their favourite cocktails are prepared.

subfolders.title: Simbambili Game Lodge
subfolders.description: Simbambili Game Lodge is tucked away among a tree line overlooking the Manyeleti River in the Northern section of the Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park. The Sabi Sand Reserve offers the best game viewing in South Africa, so guests can expect to see Africa’s Big 5 – lion, leopard, elephant, buffalo & rhino - as well as many other interesting animals.

subfolders.title: Singita Boulders Lodge
subfolders.description: Singita Boulders Lodge is – without a doubt - one of the Greater Kruger’s best premier camps.  Located in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park, Singita provides excellent game viewing year-round. The lodge welcomes discerning travellers from across the globe to come & experience a safari in the lap of luxury.

subfolders.title: Singita Castleton
subfolders.description: Singita Castleton is – without a doubt - one of the Greater Kruger’s best private villas.  Located in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park, Singita provides excellent game viewing year-round. This exclusive use farmhouse-villa welcomes discerning travellers from across the globe to come & experience a safari in the lap of luxury.

subfolders.title: Singita Ebony Lodge
subfolders.description: Singita Ebony Lodge is – without a doubt - one of the Greater Kruger’s best premier camps & enjoys a spectacular location on the banks of the Sand River.  Located in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve, adjacent to the Kruger National Park, Singita provides excellent game viewing year-round. The lodge welcomes discerning travellers from across the globe to come & experience a safari in the lap of luxury.

subfolders.title: Tengile River Lodge
subfolders.description: Tengile River Lodge boasts a spectacular location in the world-renowned Sabi Sand Reserve & shares unfenced borders with the Kruger National Park. Following the curve of the riverbank, each area in the lodge offers magnificent river views.

subfolders.title: Ulusaba Cliff Lodge
subfolders.description: Ulusaba Cliff Lodge, the brainchild of Sir Richard Branson, is located within the Northern section of the Sabi Sand Reserve in the Greater Kruger region. The lodge is ideal for those interested in an exclusive & private safari experience.  Exclusive use of the lodge includes the use of both Cliff Lodge Suites, a private guide, vehicle & chef.  The suites can also be booked individually.

subfolders.title: Ulusaba Rock Lodge
subfolders.description: Ulusaba Rock Lodge is located within the Sabi Sand Reserve & perched on the summit of a hill with magnificent views over the vast Lowveld & the distant Drakensberg Mountain range. Phenomenal game viewing can be enjoyed from the comfort of the lounge or viewing deck.  Because the lodge is elevated, it allows for unobstructed views over the bush.

subfolders.title: Ulusaba Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Ulusaba Safari Lodge is located within a secluded section of the Sabi Sand Reserve on the banks of a dry riverbed, beneath ancient Jackalberry trees. Because the lodge is built in a game-packed area, guests have ample opportunity to see wildlife passing by from the main viewing deck or the swing bridges & wooden walkways.

subfolders.title: Umkumbe Safari Lodge
subfolders.description: Umkumbe Safari Lodge is located on the banks of the Sand River in the Sabi Sand Reserve, a private concession right next to the Kruger National Park. A typical home-away-from-home camp, Umkumbe is the kind of place where you can enjoy the comforts of the bush without spending an arm & a leg on an authentic safari experience.
